articles.title: DA, other political parties decline EFF invite for Friday’s march to Sahpra’s offices - News24
articles.description: News24 understands GOOD, Patriotic Alliance, One South Africa movement, Freedom Front Plus, Action SA and the DA will not be joining the march.
articles.content:
• Most political parties have declined the EFF's invitation to join their march on Friday.
  • The ATM says it will support the EFF, but the party's president will not be available.
